about.title: About FilePay
about.mission: FilePay is designed to make selling digital files as simple as possible. Whether you're an artist, photographer, course creator, or any digital content creator, our platform provides a seamless way to monetize your work.
about.story: Built by a solo developer who understands the challenges of selling digital products online. FilePay eliminates the complexity of payment processing, file delivery, and customer management, so you can focus on creating amazing content.

simplicity.title: Simplicity First
simplicity.description: We believe selling digital files shouldn't require a computer science degree. Our interface is intuitive and straightforward.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.description: Your files and customer data are protected with enterprise-grade security measures.

support.title: Creator-Focused

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using FilePay, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: FilePay is a platform that enables users to sell digital files through secure payment links. We provide the infrastructure for file hosting, payment processing, and secure delivery to customers.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for the content they upload and sell through our platform. All content must be legal and owned by the user. Users must not upload copyrighted material without proper authorization.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Fees
payments.content: FilePay charges a small transaction fee for each successful sale. Payment processing is handled securely through our trusted payment partners. Sellers receive payouts according to our standard schedule.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service will be discontinued, and any outstanding payments will be processed according to our terms.
